item.title: Articles worth reading
item.description: A while ago I’ve discovered Wallabag . It’s a self hostable application for saving web pages. It extracts the article’s content and can automatically tag it with matching label. Basically it’s an open-source competitor of Pocket , Instapaper or Evernote . Fetching a list of all entries via Wallabag&rsquo;s API is very easy. And with a help of jq you can transform it into a simple JSON file which you can use to populate a Hugo Data Templates .
